title: Ecommerce Virtual Assistant / Operations Officer for Growing Footwear Brand
job_overview:
We are a fast-growing ecommerce footwear brand generating 7 figures annually, and we're looking to bring on an experienced Ecommerce Virtual Assistant (VA) to join our team. This is an exciting opportunity to be part of a thriving company, with the potential for growth into a COO role as we scale.

Key Responsibilities:

Coordinate with creators for content and product promotion.

Respond to customer comments and inquiries on Facebook and other social media platforms.

Manage customer service emails, ensuring timely and professional responses.

Weekly teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings to align with our goals and strategies.

Daily reporting via Slack on tasks, updates, and priorities.

As we expand, take on additional responsibilities with the opportunity to grow into a COO role.

Requirements:

Proven experience working for an ecommerce brand.

Proficient in using ChatGPT for content generation and automation tasks.

Fluent in English with excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Big bonus if you are experienced with management tools like Notion, Zapier, Slack, ClickUp, Asana, or similar.

Highly organized with an ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

Proactive, self-driven, and a quick learner.

Additional Information:

You will be expected to attend weekly teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings.

This is a full-time position with a monthly salary plus performance-based bonuses.

As the company grows, there will be room for advancement into a higher leadership role.

If you are looking for a long-term opportunity in a fast-growing ecom brand and have the skills to back it up, we'd love to hear from you!

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume, detailing your relevant experience in ecommerce, as well as any proficiency with the tools mentioned above. We look forward to seeing how you can help us scale to the next level!
